function registerPattern(bytes32 patternHash, string memory name, string memory description, uint8 severity, string memory category) external

function queryPattern(bytes32 patternHash) external view returns (tuple(bytes32 patternHash, string name, string description, uint8 severity, uint256 occurrences, uint256 firstSeen, uint256 lastSeen, string category, bool isActive))
function recordPatternOccurrence(bytes32 patternHash, address detectedAddress) external
function getPatternHistory(address addr) external view returns (bytes32[] memory)
function getAllPatternHashes() external view returns (bytes32[] memory)
function patternExists(bytes32 patternHash) external view returns (bool)
event PatternDetected(bytes32 indexed patternHash, address indexed detectedAddress, uint8 severity, uint256 timestamp)
event ThreatBlocked(bytes32 indexed patternHash, address indexed blockedAddress, address indexed user, uint256 timestamp)
event MemoryAdded(bytes32 indexed patternHash, string name, uint8 severity, string category, uint256 timestamp)
event PatternOccurrence(bytes32 indexed patternHash, uint256 newOccurrenceCount, uint256 timestamp)
